name: Fire Flora #41
description: I am an Australian artist inspired by the natural world. Working across the disciplines of painting and digital media, I make art with fire itself, using my work as a vehicle to raise awareness about the ecological perils facing the planet. The images in this collection were made in the wake of the 2019/20 Australian bushfires. I burnt a series of painted timber panels with a blow torch and pyrography equipment, photographed the work and then composited the images in Photoshop.
